BEING A SPEECH MEANT TO ADDRESS THE SCHOOL ON MY NOMINATION AS A DAY DIRECTOR , CROWE INTERNATIONAL SCHOOLS, TODAY THURSDAY 11TH OF MARCH ,2023.
I, ADEBIYI ISREAL a student of this great citadel of learning, Crowe International Schools, SS1 Science Class, give all praises and adoration to the BIG-ONE in the sky (God Almighty) for giving me the divine and uncommon grace to emerge as the winner of “A-DAY DIRECTOR” programme of this wonderful citadel, having passed through series of interviews both in written and Oral.
First, need I tell you that man proposes and God disposes. Even though the programme had been predestined by God to happen, it wouldn’t have been this credible and fun-fill, if not for the strategic and administrative cooperation of both the first and second citizens of the federal republic of Crowe Schools through the hands of Mr. Alli A. Adetayo; the actual Director of the school and Mr. Jessy Moses Achoche; the Head of Administration and Registrar of the school.
Thousands of near and clean mouths can not thank you both enough for your indispensable and unquantifiable academic and moral input. You are example of great leaders who help in shaping the lives of the entire Crowe students. I acknowledge that truly “there’s a place where morals never dwindle”.
Moreover, occurrence of this kind of intellectual and administrative programme (A-Day Director) makes it evident that Crowe schools will never fail to raise students that all hails.
Secondly, the school management aim for “pace setting” in Iwo and its environ as well as in Nigeria at large. However, both academic and nonacademic staff members are the actualizers and translators of this dream.
This speech is never a form of address if I fail to recognize the tireless efforts of all my teachers. I say, you are all special and wonderful people and may you all reap the good fruits of your labour. To consolidate my recognition and appreciation of your laborious efforts on me. I, on this day approve the payment of your transportation allowance.
This is to be paid in the next 24 hours. The allowance is to help cushion and relief you of the financial stress that is associated with it.
Finally, history has made today, another day of record that ; I, Adebiyi Isreal have made the list of Crowe Schools Director.
I won’t end this speech without acknowledging my loving parents, Engineer Mr and Mrs Adebiyi, for their support and encouragement especially during my lowest moments. May you live long to enjoy the good fruit of your labour.
Today made me feel on top of the world and happy indeed. Meanwhile, my leadership style promises to be Friendly, but also credible as possible.
Thank you and God bless you all.
God bless Crowe Schools
God bless Nigeria.
